main event: A civilian reported seeing a single unidentified object in the sky over Clarksville, Ohio on May 2, 1965.
interesting points: The object seemed to hover and zig-zag as it moved across the sky.
The object appeared to go in front of and behind the stars.
The witness believed the object was a satellite such as ECHO I, ECHO II, or PEGASUS.
Experts later confirmed the sighting was likely of man-made satellites.
sighted object: A single unidentified object in the sky
